author: Special Correspondent
text:
Volunteers of Youth Red Cross (YRC), college students and professors took out a helmet awareness rally here on Monday, as part of the Road Safety Week, organised in the district by Regional Transport Department last week.

About 100 YRC volunteers, students and professors took out the rally through the busy roads along Roman Church, Aranmanai, Kenikarai and Murugan Temple, creating awareness of the importance of wearing helmets by two-wheeler riders. They distributed pamphlets with pictorial warnings of fatal accidents involving helmet-less two-wheeler riders. S. Haroon, Vice-Chairman of the district branch of Indian Red Cross (IRC), presided over a function, and M. Chinnaiah, Principal of Sethupathy Government Arts College, flagged off the rally. M. Ragland Madhuram, Secretary of the district branch of the IRC, organised the rally.
title: Helmet awareness rally
